Philosophy &homalg;
The package &homalg; is meant to be the first volume of a continuously growing opensource book about http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homological_algebra. &homalg; is an attempt to translate as much as possible of homological algebra, as can be found in books like , , , , and , into a language that also a computer can directly understand. Yes, ``also'': &homalg; should, as the above mentioned books, by a great extent be readable by a human being. Finding such a language was by no means an easy task (&see; ). For the reasons mentioned below (&see; ) I have chosen &GAP4; as the language of this book project.
